subject: IT IS WITH DEEPEST SADNESS AND HEAVIEST OF HEARTS THAT I HAVE TO ANNOUNCE THE DEATH OF MRS.LARA DAVIDSON,TO YOU MR.DENNIS.
body:
Attn: Mr.Dennis,

For the sake of being honest and straightforward sincere to human and to
God. Even though no matter how hard you try you can never please
everyone.Some will still criticize and disrespect but It's okay because in
life you will not/never be loved/like by all no matter what you do.Just to
bring to your notice even though you did not contact/write my noble
chambers but now you been informed.

It is with deepest sadness that i have to announce to you today the death
of much admired (Ms.Lara Davidson Dean) who passed away today morning
Dakar-Senegal time 9;19 AM today Monday,February 19,2024,i received the sad
news of the tragedy with "GREAT PAIN" i am profoundly saddened to learn
that Ms.Lara Davidson Dean,did not survive the surgery. I am deeply
saddened to hear and receive a phone call news from the Doctors here from
the hospital Private Hospital Principal De Dakar-Senegal.

The beautiful and inspiring (Ms.Lara Davidson Dean) passed away,age 54
years,this morning Monday,February 19,2024,She was a brave and courageous
woman who touched so many hearts with her determination to raise awareness
of Breast Cancer despite being very ill herself.Since her diagnosis of
Breast Cancer she devoted a significant amount of her own money and time
trying to raise the profile of the disease that she like many other Breast
Cancer patients had not heard of before her diagnosis.

My thoughts and prayers are with her i will never forget her she will be
dearly missed and remain in the hearts and thoughts of all she have helped
(Ms.Lara Davidson Dean) is no longer with us though her legacy will live on
for ages both in her mission to accomplish her heart wish and desire to use
her fund in helping the Orphanages,Widows,Refugees,Education for Les
Privileges and Propagating the Word of GOD and to endeavor that the house
of Lord is maintained THIS IS HER WISH AND WILL FOR YOU TO CARRY ON,
MR.DENNIS.

Respectfully,Barrister/Solicitor.
Avocat Diop Lamine, {S.A.S Esq}
Address; 47,Boulevard Republique
Immeuble Sorano,2nd Floor
Dakar 14392
Senegal
Phone+221-705872747
e-mail: avocatdlaminechambers@lawyer.com


N/B ;
(Ms.Lara Davidson Dean) have fought the good fight,she have finished the
race,she have kept the faith.Now there is in store for her the crown of
righteousness,which the Lord,the righteous Judge,will award to her on that
day and not only to her,but also to you (MR.DENNIS) and all others who have
longed for his appearing.

HER LAST WORDS BEFORE SHE PASS ON. I, Ms.Lara Davidson Dean, want to
remember your face (Mr.Dennis) so that when i meet and sees you in heaven,i
will be able to recognize you and say thank you once more and again for
your dedication hard work honesty and sincerity to follow in accomplishing
my legacy and accomplish my heart wishes and desire to use the fund
(us$1.8M) in helping the Orphanages,Widows,Refugees,Education for Les
Privileges and Propagating the Word of GOD and to endeavor that the house
of Lord is maintained.

subject: Re: IT IS WITH DEEPEST SADNESS AND HEAVIEST OF HEARTS THAT I HAVE TO ANNOUNCE THE DEATH OF MRS.LARA DAVIDSON,TO YOU MR.DENNIS.
body:
Hello there,

I'm deeply saddened to hear about the passing of Davidson Dean. She sounds like she was a truly remarkable woman who made a significant impact on those around her. Her dedication to raising awareness for Breast Cancer is truly inspiring.

It's touching to know that she had such a strong desire to help others and spread the Word of God. I'm curious, could you tell me more about her mission? How did she plan on using her funds to assist those less privileged?

Also, I'd love to know more about how you knew Davidson Dean and your relationship with her. It seems like she had a profound effect on your life.

Thank you for sharing this with me.

Best wishes,
Dennis
